newsitem.title: USA: Golf Trust gets $100 mln loan commitment.
newsitem.headline: Golf Trust gets $100 mln loan commitment.

text.p: Golf Trust of America Inc said Thusday that its operating partnership has obtained a commitment for a two-year, $100 million secured revolving bank credit facility, which it will use to pursue additional golf courses and for working capital.

Borrowings under the facility will carry a floating interest rate of LIBOR plus 1.75 to 2.00 percentage points, with provisions for the rate to be reduced upon the attainment of a senior debt rating, said the company.
NationsBank Corp will serve as the administrative agent of the facility, said the company, which includes three banks.
